name: TODCM Curriculum Mapping
short_description: TODCM (Template Object Driven Curriculum Mapping) is an open source curriculum mapping application written in PHP and CodeIgnitor MVC framework. Ideal for K12 schools, universities, large corporations and NGOs. Visit http://todcm.org for more detail.
